CustomField.description: Indicates whether this product is advisable and why - because it's an Octopus Wealth one or part of the wider Octopus Group. If blank, it is not advisable or not yet categorised as advisable.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If own, this is an Octopus Wealth product. If group, this is product is provided by a member of Octopus Group. Does not cover protection or trusts.
CustomField.label: Advisable product
